channel.title: YAML Manifests :: Choria Configuration Manager
channel.description: A manifest is a YAML file that combines data, hierarchy configuration, and resources in a single file. Manifests support template expressions but not procedural logic. Think of them as declarative configuration similar to multi-resource shell scripts. Note A JSON Schema for manifests is available at https://choria.io/schemas/ccm/v1/manifest.json.
